name: Show thread/microblog delta since last visit
author: shazbot
label: Show thread/microblog delta since last visit
desc: Intended for magazine moderators (or others) checking for new magazine activity. If there are new threads/microblogs since your last visit, shows the delta at the top of the page.

fields.label: Permanently display counts in top bar (best for mobile). Set to off to only display bar when there are new threads/blogs.
